comment.author: 40648104@N05
comment._content: There are errors all over. 1. the title is incorrect. That was the Malta Opera House that was distorted by a bomb during an air raid in WWII. see: www.maltaoperahouse.com/ 2. Malta does not have, and never had, gondolas. Small hired transport boats in Malta are called Dghajsa (pronounced, Dice-a). 3. the tag says Africa, Malta is, and always has been, part of Europe. 4. What does this image have to do with Zoology Mammals?

comment.author: 42201095@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/calleia]  Maybe because there's a horse there? Just a guess!
